result.title: Topic 1: Dynamic Programming
result.content:
For tutorials you can see:

https://www.codechef.com/wiki/tutorial-dynamic-programming
 http://community.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=tutorials&d2=dynProg

Also check out the concept of Grundy Numbers:
https://www.topcoder.com/community/data-science/data-science-tutorials/algorithm-games/
DP(long) contest has problems for practice. Problems will be added gradually.

Try to solve every question.
There will be total 20 questions to solve in 7 days
None of the question are too easy and some have special concepts which you can learn.
In order to see test cases(I do not reccomend) you can google the problem name,open it and submit your solution.
